CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y     wget g++ cmake cmake-curses-gui make libexpat1-dev zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev libsparsehash-dev     libboost-program-options-dev libboost-dev libgdal-dev libproj-dev doxygen graphviz pandoc

CmdLine: wget https://github.com/osmcode/libosmium/archive/v${OSMIUM_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     tar xzvf v${OSMIUM_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     rm v${OSMIUM_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     mv libosmium-${OSMIUM_VERSION} libosmium
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd libosmium &&     mkdir build && cd build &&     cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DBUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF -DBUILD_TESTING=OFF -DINSTALL_PROTOZERO=ON .. &&     make
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget https://github.com/osmcode/osmium-tool/archive/v${OSMIUM_TOOL_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     tar xzvf v${OSMIUM_TOOL_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     rm v${OSMIUM_TOOL_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     mv osmium-tool-${OSMIUM_TOOL_VERSION} osmium-tool
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd osmium-tool &&     mkdir build && cd build &&     cmake -DOSMIUM_INCLUDE_DIR=/var/install/libosmium/include/ .. &&     make
